name: Large Pack
description: Unlocks the 2nd row of inventory (12 more slots, total 24).

name: Deluxe Pack
description: Unlocks the 3rd row of inventory (infinite slots).

name: Rice
description: A basic grain often served under vegetables.

name: Wheat Flour
description: A common cooking ingredient made from crushed wheat seeds.

name: Bouquet
description: A gift that shows your romantic interest. (Unlocked after reaching level 2 friendship with a player)

name: Wedding Ring
description: It's used to ask for another farmer's hand in marriage. (Unlocked after reaching level 3 friendship with a player)

name: Dehydrator (Recipe)
description: A recipe to make Dehydrator

name: Grass Starter (Recipe)
description: A recipe to make Grass Starter

name: Sugar
description: Adds sweetness to pastries and candies. Too much can be unhealthy.

name: Oil
description: All purpose cooking oil.

name: Vinegar
description: An aged fermented liquid used in many cooking recipes.

name: Deluxe Retaining Soil
description: This soil will not need watering ever again. Mix into tilled soil.

name: Grass Starter
description: Place this on your farm to start a new patch of grass.

name: Speed-Gro
description: Makes the plants grow 1 day earlier.

name: Apple Sapling
description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Apple tree. Bears fruit in the fall. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.

name: Apricot Sapling
description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Apricot tree. Bears fruit in the spring. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.

name: Cherry Sapling
description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Cherry tree. Bears fruit in the spring. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.

name: Orange Sapling
description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Orange tree. Bears fruit in the summer. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.

name: Peach Sapling
description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Peach tree. Bears fruit in the summer. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.

name: Pomegranate Sapling
description: Takes 28 days to produce a mature Pomegranate tree. Bears fruit in the fall. Only grows if the 8 surrounding "tiles" are empty.

name: Basic Retaining Soil
description: This soil will not need watering for 5 days.. Mix into tilled soil.

name: Quality Retaining Soil
description: This soil will not need watering for 7 days.. Mix into tilled soil.

name: Parsnip Seeds
description: Plant these in the spring. Takes 4 days to mature.

name: Bean Starter
description: Plant these in the spring. Takes 10 days to mature, but keeps producing after that. Grows on a trellis.

name: Cauliflower Seeds
description: Plant these in the spring. Takes 12 days to produce a large cauliflower.

name: Potato Seeds
description: Plant these in the spring. Takes 6 days to mature, and has a chance of yielding multiple potatoes at harvest.

name: Tulip Bulb
description: Plant in spring. Takes 6 days to produce a colorful flower. Assorted colors.

name: Kale Seeds
description: Plant these in the spring. Takes 6 days to mature. Harvest with the scythe.

name: Jazz Seeds
description: Plant in spring. Takes 7 days to produce a blue puffball flower.

name: Garlic Seeds
description: Plant these in the spring. Takes 4 days to mature.

name: Rice Shoot
description:
Plant these in the spring. Takes 8 days to mature. Grows faster if planted near a body of water. 
Harvest with the scythe.

name: Melon Seeds
description: Plant these in the summer. Takes 12 days to mature.

name: Tomato Seeds
description: Plant these in the summer. Takes 11 days to mature, and continues to produce after first harvest.

name: Blueberry Seeds
description: Plant these in the summer. Takes 13 days to mature, and continues to produce after first harvest.

name: Pepper Seeds
description: Plant these in the summer. Takes 5 days to mature, and continues to produce after first harvest.

name: Wheat Seeds
description: Plant these in the summer or fall. Takes 4 days to mature. Harvest with the scythe.

name: Radish Seeds
description: Plant these in the summer. Takes 6 days to mature.

name: Poppy Seeds
description: Plant in summer. Produces a bright red flower in 7 days.

name: Spangle Seeds
description: Plant in summer. Takes 8 days to produce a vibrant tropical flower. Assorted colors.

name: Hops Starter
description: Plant these in the summer. Takes 11 days to grow, but keeps producing after that. Grows on a trellis.

name: Corn Seeds
description: Plant these in the summer or fall. Takes 14 days to mature, and continues to produce after first harvest.

name: Sunflower Seeds
description: Plant in summer or fall. Takes 8 days to produce a large sunflower. Yields more seeds at harvest.

name: Red Cabbage Seeds
description: Plant these in the summer. Takes 9 days to mature.

description: Plant these in the summer or fall. Takes 14 days to mature, and continues to produce after first harvest.

name: Copper Ore
description: A common ore that can be smelted into bars.

name: Iron Ore
description: A fairly common ore that can be smelted into bars.

name: Gold Ore
description: A precious ore that can be smelted into bars.

name: Coal
description: A combustible rock that is useful for crafting and smelting.

name: Wood
description: A sturdy, yet flexible plant material with a wide variety of uses.

name: Stone
description: A common material with many uses in crafting and building.

name: Normal Barn
description: Houses 4 barn-dwelling animals.

name: Big Barn
description: Houses 8 barn-dwelling animals. Unlocks goats.

name: Deluxe Barn
description: Houses 12 barn-dwelling animals. Unlocks sheep and pigs.

name: Normal Coop
description: Houses 4 coop-dwelling animals.

name: Big Coop
description: Houses 8 coop-dwelling animals. Unlocks ducks.

name: Deluxe Coop
description: Houses 12 coop-dwelling animals. Unlocks rabbits.

name: Chicken
description: Well cared-for chickens lay eggs every day. Lives in the coop.
